name: Noctrum
description:
Welcome to Noctrum ! Are you ready for this challenge ? One Night  - Ten Hours - Nine Monsters This game have been made in 7 days for the pygame halloween jam 2022. The source code can be found on the Github Repo.

In this game, The more you can see, the more you are in danger. Light is your worst enemy.

During the night, some strange beings will try to enter your room. With the help of a strange man, fight back until the morning !

For each monsters in your room, there is a clear and easy way to stay safe. Your goal is to find how...

If you lose, you 'll get tips on the Death Screen to help you.

If you are able to beat the Tutorial, an Endless mode will be available for you with a leader-board. Try to get the best score !

(You must extract the game files from the archive for a save file to be created.)

Credits :

Coding - Yvant2000's Games#1378

Art - Frizou #4663

Voices - Le Dodo #4456

Music - JustVlad #4031
